name: yn (wednesday scones)
description:
[RECOMMENDED SETTINGS: FULL SCREEN 640x480 OR LOWEST RESOLUTION]

[CONTAINS LOUD AUDIO]

lead the flock whilst standing on a raft

go towards the island

sustain the Airborne Ones with foodcubes

keep track of your birdlings

raft moves towards the edge you are closest to

Controls (Keyboard)

WASD - Move

Arrow keys - Move camera

Hold the Spacebar - Pick up birdlings or foodcubes

Mash the Enter key (while holding foodcube) - Muster more strength to toss foodcube

Release Spacebar (while holding foodcube) - Toss foodcube

Also supports USB N64 controllers [only tested on Windows] - Analog stick, D-pad, B button, A button

Credits

Art/Programming/Music by wednesday scones

Sfx made using recorded mouth noises and midi flute (distorted in Audacity)

psx_retroshader by dsoft20

[made in 48 hrs for Global Game Jam 2017]
